website_summaries.verdict: It's not the faster router out there, but the Amped Wireless Artemis RTA1300M supports MU-MIMO, is reasonably priced, and easy to install and manage.
pros: Supports Multi-User Multiple Input, Multiple Output (MU-MIMO) streaming

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for over a year. It works ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year. It works well. I have a yard 2.7 acres of grass. My iPhone gets the signal from this unit to almost the furthest location away from the unit while I am mowing. The unit sits on a table near a window on the opposite side of the house at the above location. We do have to reboot the unit once in a while. I'm not sure if it is an issue with the unit or the cable company. The internet comes right on after the reboot. This doesn't happen enough to cause any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pilotcop

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Began to need frequent reboots, increasing to twice a day before taken out of service.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. MacCluer

customer_reviews.title: Signal strength is poor. Whenever we have multiple people streaming the internet ...
customer_reviews.text: Signal strength is poor. Whenever we have multiple people streaming the internet cuts off. Firmware upgrade does not take and this is the second time I am returning this product. Do not buy this product. I am not sure how people are claiming 10000sq ft when I barely had good strength at 2000 sq ft.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Went from 40 mbs to 140 mbs instantly and now we get signal anywhere inside or out in our 1.5 acre yard. Easy set up, easy to use Thank God, as I am not a techie. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Died after 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 11 months, i would never buy Amped Wireless brand again. My previous cheap router been 5 years and still works. Save your money get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Avo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and stable router...ok with multiple devices and 4K streaming. Great price
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Despite poor phone connection your customer service agent was able to work on resolving the issue
customer_reviews.author: Grigore Burdea

customer_reviews.title: It was not as simple to install as advertised. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not as simple to install as advertised. I spent several hour with customer support to have an additional desk top computer, and two printers connected to the AC1300.. the customer support person was extremely patient and very helpful. I don't have her name but she worked every device until we were connected.
customer_reviews.author: DickH in TX

customer_reviews.title: I've had the router running now for eight months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the router running now for eight months and the 5GHz radio quit working. Trying to work with customer support to get a replacement router. Previously had a D-Link router which lasted six years without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pontus

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I get enough signal through a window and 450 feet away to use a network extender.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: doesnt have enough range for what i needed but im still using the product
customer_reviews.author: janel horne

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: The item I recieved was not a wifi router, but rather a wifi range extender... Don't get me wrong it does what it says and solved my wifi not reaching my room, but I was still sent a product not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: EastyetWest

product_meta.title: Amped Wireless ARTEMIS, High Power AC1300 Wi-Fi Router with MU-MIMO (RTA1300M)
product_meta.description: The Artemis is the ultimate router for the multi-device household. Built with a quad-core processor, 8 High power amplifiers, and 2 High gain antennas, the Artemis delivers unmatched Wi-Fi performance. It is equipped to provide unprecedented coverage, speed, and reliability for the most demanding networks with many connected devices. Extremely fast AC1300 Wi-Fi technology provides up to 1.26Gbps, making lag and buffering a thing of the past for everyone.3 the Artemis also features cutting Edge MU-MIMO technology that enables multiple devices to receive data at once, granting uninterrupted streaming for all.
feature_bullets: High power technology delivers whole-home Wi-Fi coverage, that's a combination of 8 powerful amplifiers and 2 high gain antennas
Unmatched AC1300 Wi-Fi speeds and multi-user MIMO make for better performance and more speed for everyone
A powerful Quad-Core Processor handles heavy traffic with ease, so you can game without lag and stream HD and 4K media without buffering
File sharing with a USB 3.0 port, as well as 4 additional Gigabit Ports for network devices like smart TVs, gaming consoles and PCs
Advanced security Features like coverage control, website blocking and SPI firewall – all backed by Elite support, Amped wireless' free, US based, in-house, technical support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars19 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
